name: Jello Kitty Anjo
description:
A game about Cute Jelly Cats! 

Every work week, perform 5 experiments that test the potential of Jelly Cats!

Experiments for the first week are as follows:

BazooCAT

Help a Jelly Cat go through loops by launching them with the Cannon!

Controls:

  • Adjust the angle of the cannon by clicking either the up or down arrows.
  • Click the Fire button to launch the Jelly Cat toward a loop

Purrfectly Painted

Dip your cat in jars of paint to get the right colored cat!

Controls:

  • Grab the cat by holding the Left Mouse Button and dragging it to the correct jars of paint

MediCATion

Some Jelly Cats are getting sick! Feed them the right medicine to help them feel better!

Controls:

  • Select a medicine by holding the left mouse button and dragging it to the mouth of a Jelly Cat to feed it.

Cats In A Vat

We need to deliver the right set of cats. We have to satisfy the customer needs by choosing the right colored cats

Controls:

  • Click and hold any cat using the left mouse button. Then drag it to the Container in the middle.
  • Drag in ALL the correct/relevant colored cats that are in the area.

Color Carnage

Find the right Jelly Cat that suits the colors that you need!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • E to Interact

Have fun! Thank you for playing!

Credits:

Harrison Manalo - 2D Artist

Gino Diccion - Programmer

Daniel Conde - Programmer

James Tañeda - Sound Designer (some sound effects are from zapsplat.com)
